TaskDescription.Detail: Input values ​​and commands into Notepad by imitating the way a keyboard works.

Assist.value: You can run the specified app. Let's run Notepad.
Click the Run button to run Notepad.
Input the specified text in the open notepad.
Double-click on the highlighted box, Specify a blank part of the notepad.
Set the text to be input into the targeted notepad. Input 'test' in the text box.
Click the Run button to check the text input.
Set the keyboard behavior to open the replacement window.
Set the key event. When you click the red circle, it detects motion until you click the circle again. Try setting the Ctrl+H command behavior.
Set the keyboard action for inputting the Summary text. (This is the action to set what to find in the Replace window.)
Set the key event. Set the text to test in the same way as before.
Set up text input and commands by imitating keyboard actions. (This is the action to set the content to be replaced in the Replace window.)
Set the key event. Input the tab command and set the text to replace in the same way as before.
Replace all by setting the keyboard behavior.
Set the key event. Input the Alt+A command in the same way as before.
Close the Replace window by setting the keyboard behavior.
Set the key event. Set the esc command in the same way as before.
